entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianFenGuardsmenDescription
entry.value: Light infantry focussed on ambushing and harassing the enemy. Smaller squad size, but faster, more accurate, and can more easily demolish enemy machines.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianFenGuardsmenFlavor
entry.value: After years of being soaked and trekking through mud, even the typical Drookian Fen Guardsman can easily maneuver through tough terrain.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianStormtrooperDescription
entry.value: Elite light infantry. Weaker, but sneakier than a regular Tempestus Scion.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianStormtrooperFlavor
entry.value: With enough firepower, a routine ambush can turn into a decimated enemy division.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianScoutDescription
entry.value: Even lighter infantry with greater emphasis on scouting and harassment. Can ambush enemies to steal resources. Can infiltrate after researching Substructure Extension.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianScoutFlavor
entry.value: The most agile soldiers of the Fen Guard, traversing through rough terrain like water.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianAssassinDescription
entry.value: Light melee infantry trained to exploit exposed infantry and to take down heroes. Can infiltrate after researching Substructure Extension.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianAssassinFlavor
entry.value: When night falls, sentries continue to patrol the perimeter, bored out of their minds. When day breaks, the outpost is devoid of life.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianHoverChimeraDescription
entry.value: Swift, hovering transport vehicle specializing in rapid behind-enemy-lines insertions. Trades protection and damage for speed.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianHoverChimeraFlavor
entry.value: Wheels and tracks have no place on the soft mud of the Drookian bogs. In turn, Drookian transports hover above the ground, slipping through decaying foliage.
